statements: SELECT * FROM DrugInteraction;
SELECT drug_name, interaction FROM DrugInteraction;
SELECT drug_name, interaction, severity FROM DrugInteraction WHERE severity='Severe';
SELECT interaction, drug_name FROM DrugInteraction WHERE severity='Mild';
SELECT drug_name, interaction, severity FROM DrugInteraction ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT drug_name, interaction, severity FROM DrugInteraction WHERE severity = 'High' ORDER BY drug_name ASC, interaction DESC
SELECT interaction, severity FROM DrugInteraction WHERE interaction LIKE '%serious%' AND severity IN ('High', 'Medium')
SELECT drug_name, count(*) as total_interactions FROM DrugInteraction GROUP BY drug_name HAVING count(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM DrugInteraction ORDER BY drug_name LIMIT 5
SELECT drug_name, interaction, severity FROM DrugInteraction WHERE severity IN ('Low', 'Medium') AND (drug_name = 'Aspirin' OR interaction = 'allergy') ORDER BY drug_name DESC, interaction ASC
SELECT * FROM Drug_Interactions;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_type FROM Drug_Interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Severe';
SELECT * FROM Medication_Management ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_description FROM Drug_Interactions WHERE drug_id = 3;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(drug_id) AS total_medications FROM Medication_Management GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Drug_Interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Severe';
SELECT drug_name, interaction_type FROM Drug_Interactions WHERE drug_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Drug_Interactions ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT drug_name, MAX(interaction_description) AS max_description FROM Drug_Interactions GROUP BY drug_name;
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(*) AS interactions_count FROM Drug_Interactions GROUP BY drug_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Drug_Interactions;
SELECT drug_id, drug_name, interaction_description FROM Drug_Interactions ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT medication_name, frequency FROM Medications WHERE dosage = '10mg';
SELECT drug_name, interaction_type FROM Drug_Interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Severe';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_conditions FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, indications FROM Medications WHERE frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT * FROM Drug_Interactions WHERE drug_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_conditions LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medication_list WHERE frequency = 'daily';
SELECT drug1_id, drug2_id, interaction_type FROM interaction_matrix ORDER BY drug1_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_description LIKE '%severe%';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medication_list WHERE frequency = 'twice daily';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT drug1_id, drug2_id, interaction_type FROM interaction_matrix WHERE interaction_type = 'contraindicated';
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT drug_name, interaction FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age < 40;
SELECT * FROM medications LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT drug_name, interaction FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction = 'Severe';
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty LIKE '%Surgeon%';
SELECT med_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications WHERE dosage IS NOT NULL;
